text: Your Friend and Mine is a 1923 American silent drama film directed by Clarence G. Badger and starring Enid Bennett, Huntley Gordon and Willard Mack.Goble p.1026 ==Cast== * Enid Bennett as Patricia Stanton * Huntley Gordon as Hugh Stanton * Willard Mack as Ted Mason * Rosemary Theby as Mrs. Beatrice Mason * J. Herbert Frank as Victor Reymier * Otto Lederer as Andrea Mertens * Allene Ray as Marie Mertens ==References== ==Bibliography== * Goble, Alan. The Complete Index to Literary Sources in Film. Walter de Gruyter, 1999. ==External links== * Category:1923 films Category:1923 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Clarence G. Badger Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Metro Pictures films
title: Your Friend and Mine
